name: part_004
file: tmp_[#SakuraMiko New 3D Unveiling] Check out the super-elite Miko! [HoloLive⧸SakuraMiko] [T7AkrTQwSjs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Pekora hits Miko with a large carrot object in a playful manner.
Miko introduces a game of Twister, and they discuss their previous experience with it.
Pekora spins the roulette and Miko attempts the Twister poses until she eventually falls.
The two talk about the game and plan for a rematch next year.

subtitles.original: やめてぺこ！
subtitles.english: Stop it, peko!

subtitles.original: やめてよこれ！あいつすごく暴力に走る...
subtitles.english: Stop this! That guy is resorting to violence...

subtitles.original: ...人参持ったな！
subtitles.english: ...with that carrot!

subtitles.original: 人参持ってたんだもん！
subtitles.english: Because I was holding a carrot!

subtitles.original: びっくりしたぺこだな...すごいぺこ！
subtitles.english: That was a surprise, peko... Amazing, peko!

subtitles.original: 人参... 人参になっちゃうぺこ？
subtitles.english: Carrot... Am I turning into a carrot, peko?

subtitles.original: 手が人参になっちゃうぺこ！
subtitles.english: My hand is turning into a carrot, peko!

subtitles.original: 一体化されてるぺこじゃん、人参に！
subtitles.english: You're being unified with the carrot, peko!

subtitles.original: 人参... 手が人参になってしまったんです、これ。
subtitles.english: Carrot... My hand has become a carrot, look.

subtitles.original: そして今度はね、ずっとそれを使ってやってもらうぺこだからね。
subtitles.english: And next, you'll have to use that the whole time, peko.

subtitles.original: しかもなんか方向が微妙で武器にならね...
subtitles.english: And the direction is weird, so it's not working as a weapon...

subtitles.original: 内側に入ってるぺこだらね！
subtitles.english: Because it's turned inward, peko!

subtitles.original: あ、よかったぺこだな。よかった。
subtitles.english: Ah, that's good, peko. Good.

subtitles.original: 本日はこれを用意してもらったんですよ、用意。
subtitles.english: Today I had this prepared, prepared.

subtitles.original: 何？どれ？
subtitles.english: What? Which one?

subtitles.original: いだよ！みこのやつ！ドン！
subtitles.english: Here it is! Miko's thing! Boom!

subtitles.original: え？出るぺこなの？
subtitles.english: Eh? Is something coming out, peko?

subtitles.original: 出るはず...
subtitles.english: It should...

subtitles.original: ね？あれ？
subtitles.english: Right? Huh?

subtitles.original: あ！懐かしいぺこなね！
subtitles.english: Ah! How nostalgic, peko!

subtitles.original: これこれこれ！
subtitles.english: This, this, this!

subtitles.original: 一緒にやんにゃお？
subtitles.english: Let's do it together.

subtitles.original: え、やだよ。いやぺこだよ。
subtitles.english: Eh, no way. I hate it, peko.

subtitles.original: やんにゃおこれ。
subtitles.english: Let's do this.

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃそれ大変なやつぺこじゃん！去年ぺこらたちさ、死んだやつじゃんこれで！
subtitles.english: That's a super tough one, peko! Last year, we almost died from this!

subtitles.original: うん。何でここでまた再会したかっていうとやっぱりクリスマスが近いからってわけだな。
subtitles.english: Yeah. The reason we're meeting it again here is because Christmas is coming up.

subtitles.original: え、ぺこら今回指示していいってこと？
subtitles.english: Eh, so I can give instructions this time?

subtitles.original: え？ぺこらがルーレット回すってことぺこですか、みこ先輩？
subtitles.english: Eh? Does that mean I'm the one spinning the roulette, Miko-senpai?

subtitles.original: お前ウキウキじゃねーか。
subtitles.english: You look pretty excited.

subtitles.original: じゃ、ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルルルルル...
subtitles.english: Then, Pekora's roulette start! Trrrrr...

subtitles.original: やばい、今日パンツ見えて大丈夫なの？
subtitles.english: Oh no, is it okay if my panties are visible today?

subtitles.original: あ、オッケぺこじゃ際どい感じでもいいってことか？そんなことはない？
subtitles.english: Ah, okay peko, so it's fine even if it's a bit risky? No?

subtitles.original: そうではない。そうではない。うん。
subtitles.english: That's not it. That's not it. Yeah.

subtitles.original: 右足が...黄緑！
subtitles.english: Right foot... lime green!

subtitles.original: ま、最初は簡単ぺこだよね。
subtitles.english: Yeah. Well, it's easy at first, peko.

subtitles.original: 余裕余裕。
subtitles.english: Easy breezy.

subtitles.original: ま、まずはね。
subtitles.english: Well, for starters.

subtitles.original: そしたら、ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルルルルル...ピン！
subtitles.english: Then, Pekora's roulette start! Trrrr... pin!

subtitles.original: はい！左手が...
subtitles.english: Yes! Left hand...

subtitles.original: 左手が...え、左手？
subtitles.english: Left hand... eh, left hand?

subtitles.original: 赤！左手が赤！
subtitles.english: Red! Left hand, red!

subtitles.original: あ、まだ楽勝ぺこか。二個目だもん。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's still easy peko. It's only the second one.

subtitles.original: あれ？ちょっときつそう？余裕余裕。
subtitles.english: Huh? Getting tough? Easy breezy.

subtitles.original: さすがエリートぺこだからね、そこはね、楽勝ぺこだよね。いける？
subtitles.english: As expected of an elite, peko. So it should be a breeze, peko. Ready?

subtitles.original: じゃ、ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルルルル...チャン！チャン！
subtitles.english: Then, Pekora's roulette start! Trrrr... ta-da! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: 左足...え？青！左足...
subtitles.english: Left foot... Eh? Blue! Left foot...

subtitles.original: あ、奥目ね、奥の方ね、奥の方ね。青。
subtitles.english: Ah, way back there, in the back, in the back. Blue.

subtitles.original: うわ！青ぺこだって！青ぺこだって！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's blue, peko! It's blue, peko!

subtitles.original: ね、アイドルとして大変な姿になってる！恥ずかしいぺこ！
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm in a very un-idol-like pose! It's embarrassing, peko!

subtitles.original: アイドルとしてすごい大変になってる！あ、ここんじゃなーい？
subtitles.english: As an idol, I'm in a real bind! Ah, isn't it here?

subtitles.original: 膝ついてだめぺこだよ、膝。右足の膝。
subtitles.english: You can't touch the floor with your knee, peko. Your knee. Your right foot's knee.

subtitles.original: あ、そうそうそう！それは禁止だ！
subtitles.english: Ah, right, right! That's forbidden!

subtitles.original: そしたら、ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルルルル...
subtitles.english: Then, Pekora's roulette start! Trrrrr...

subtitles.original: 右手...右手...はい！
subtitles.english: Right hand... Right hand... Yes!

subtitles.original: 赤！赤！お、いいぺこだね！
subtitles.english: Red! Red! Oh, looking good, peko!

subtitles.original: あんた今最高に間抜けな格好してるよ！
subtitles.english: You're in the most ridiculous-looking pose right now!

subtitles.original: お手！ちょっと待って待って待って...赤！
subtitles.english: Hand! Wait, wait, wait... Red!

subtitles.original: お手！赤！ちょっと待ってよ！
subtitles.english: Hand! Red! Wait a minute!

subtitles.original: 真剣なんだからね！
subtitles.english: I'm being serious here!

subtitles.original: じゃ、ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルル...もうだめだ、みこ。
subtitles.english: Then, Pekora's roulette start! Trrrr... You're done, Miko.

subtitles.original: ちょっと楽な体勢にしようぺこか。うん。
subtitles.english: Let's give you a slightly easier pose, peko. Yeah.

subtitles.original: えっと、右足...はい！黄色！
subtitles.english: Um, right foot... Yes! Yellow!

subtitles.original: あ、いいね。ちょっと楽になったぺこな。
subtitles.english: Ah, nice. That made it a bit easier, peko.

subtitles.original: あ、いいねいいね。そしたら...
subtitles.english: Ah, nice, nice. Then...

subtitles.original: ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルルルル...チャン！
subtitles.english: Pekora's roulette start! Trrrr... Ta-da!

subtitles.original: 左足、緑。
subtitles.english: Left foot, green.

subtitles.original: うわ！吊りそうだが、そうなっちゃうぺこか？
subtitles.english: Whoa! I'm about to get a cramp, but that's how it's gonna be?

subtitles.original: あんた逃げたね！あんた逃げたね！
subtitles.english: You cheated! You cheated!

subtitles.original: この体勢に行くと思わなかった。クソ！うねーな！
subtitles.english: I didn't think I'd end up in this pose. Dammit! You're so mean!

subtitles.original: じゃ、ぺこらルーレットスタート！ドルルルル...チャン！左手、緑。
subtitles.english: Then, Pekora's roulette start! Trrrr... Ta-da! Left hand, green.

subtitles.original: 左手ってどっち？こっち？こっち？緑、緑...
subtitles.english: Which one's the left hand? This one? This one? Green, green...

subtitles.original: あ、無理だよ！もう終わり！
subtitles.english: Ah, it's impossible! It's over!

subtitles.original: いけるいける、みこ先輩！まだいける！いてないぺこか？
subtitles.english: You can do it, Miko-senpai! You can still do it! Not yet, peko?

subtitles.original: 緑届かないよ！
subtitles.english: I can't reach green!

subtitles.original: へ...エリートみこがここで終了ということぺこか。
subtitles.english: Heh... So this is where Elite Miko ends, peko?

subtitles.original: これ広すぎるで、これ。
subtitles.english: This is too wide, this.

subtitles.original: 広くねぺこ？いけるぺこでしょ。
subtitles.english: Isn't it wide, peko? You can do it, peko.

subtitles.original: 無理だよ...終わる。
subtitles.english: It's impossible... I'm done.

subtitles.original: 拷問かなってきてるぺこだけど。
subtitles.english: It's starting to look like torture, peko.

subtitles.original: あ、寝ちゃったよ。おやすみぺこ。よいしょ。
subtitles.english: Ah, she fell asleep. Goodnight, peko. There we go.

subtitles.original: や、あんたエリートとしてもっと頑張らなきゃぺこだよ。
subtitles.english: Hey, you have to work harder as an elite, peko.

subtitles.original: いや、本当に去年よりも全然できない。
subtitles.english: No, really, I can't do it at all compared to last year.

subtitles.original: 去年もできなかったけど今年もできねーな。
subtitles.english: I couldn't do it last year either, and I still can't do it this year.

subtitles.original: 来年はきっとうまくいくぺこだよ。
subtitles.english: I'm sure it'll go well next year, peko.

subtitles.original: 絶対やらすからね、みこも今度ツイスターゲーム。
subtitles.english: I'll definitely make you do it next time too, the Twister game.

subtitles.original: いやぺこだよ。なんでよ！
subtitles.english: No way, peko. Why?!

subtitles.original: ぺこらは見てる方が楽しかった。ルーレットやってる方がすごい楽しかったぺこ。
subtitles.english: Pekora had more fun watching. Doing the roulette was super fun, peko.
